com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds

Class SurvivalWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.GameWorld
      • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.SurvivalWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameWorld, IGameWorldHeroInputs, DummyEnemyFeature, HeroLightFeature

    public class SurvivalWorld
extends GameWorld
implements HeroLightFeature
    This class manages the games's logic for the survivel mode of the game.
